overview: Like the saltwater crocodile in Australia, the American crocodile population in Florida is making a comeback. As the crocodile population grows, zoologists are putting solutions into place to keep crocs away from people and prevent croc attacks.
tagline: This informational, jaw-clenching, and nerve rattling one hour special  will take you into the depths of the Crocpocalypse with incredible stories of attacks and encounters.
title: Crocpocalypse
